column4: *Off topic* Could anyone suggest which would make a better chouce between a budget Acer 14'' or budget Toshiba 15'' notebook? Quality wise?
i'd suggest looking up the models in question on tuxmobile, if your gonna run linux on it
on technical stuff though, and monitor, i'd go for the toshiba.
Zara_thrustra: gparted has issues with the vista ntfa filesystem
I triple boot XP, VISTA and Ubuntu and have no problems, maybe im just special :(
XP fixes up the vista partiton when it boots
I see.
Zara_thrustra : actually i recommend moving the recovery partition to optical media first, then doing anything.
recovery what?
laptop recovery partitions? they don't play nice with grub ;)
ya i wipe those too :)
true, IF he has media
Acer has provided me Vista cd's go figure.
well the current ones are still ok
yeah it is
wonder when the promised port to linux will happen/the mainline client on linux will be moved
as in 24/7, i need rest.
I port would be nice, i thought there was one already.
beta i think
That wonderful, now all i need is mIRC and MSN Messenger :) j/k
MIRC sucks. MSNIM is getting more and more bloated ;)
haha, i like the way they look under Vista, eye candy.
